statements: SELECT * FROM player_health_tracking;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_health_tracking WHERE recovery_progress = 'in_progress';
SELECT treatment_description, recovery_progress FROM player_health_tracking WHERE injury_type = 'knee' OR injury_type = 'shoulder';
SELECT player_name, recovery_progress FROM player_health_tracking WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM player_health_tracking ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_health_tracking WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, recovery_progress FROM player_health_tracking WHERE injury_type = 'knee' AND recovery_progress = 'in_progress';
SELECT player_name, treatment_description FROM player_health_tracking ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, injury_type, treatment_description FROM player_health_tracking WHERE recovery_progress = 'not_started';
SELECT * FROM player_health_tracking WHERE recovery_progress <> 'recovered' ORDER BY player_id ASC, player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuries
SELECT player_id, injury_description FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE injury_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT treatment_description FROM PlayerInjuries ORDER BY treatment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM RecoveryProgress WHERE improvement_description LIKE '%progress%'
SELECT player_id, recovery_date FROM RecoveryProgress
SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM RecoveryProgress WHERE recovery_date >='2022-01-01' ORDER BY recovery_date DESC
SELECT player_id, injury_description FROM PlayerInjuries WHERE injury_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuries JOIN RecoveryProgress ON PlayerInjuries.player_id = RecoveryProgress.player_id WHERE RecoveryProgress.improvement_description LIKE '%recovered%'
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_injuries FROM PlayerInjuries GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY num_injuries DESC
SELECT * FROM player_injuries;
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM player_injuries WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_duration FROM treatments WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recovery_progress WHERE player_id = 3 AND progress_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(progress_id) AS progress_count FROM recovery_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_injuries WHERE injury_type = 'Fracture';
SELECT player_id, treatment_type FROM treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, progress_date, recovery_notes FROM recovery_progress WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_duration FROM treatments WHERE player_id = 5 AND treatment_duration > 7;
SELECT * FROM player_injuries WHERE injury_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_name, age FROM Player ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Player WHERE age > 25;
SELECT player_name, injury_date, recovery_status FROM Player JOIN Injury ON Player.player_id = Injury.player_id;

SELECT player_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Player JOIN Injury ON Player.player_id = Injury.player_id JOIN Treatment ON Injury.injury_id = Treatment.injury_id ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_name, age FROM Player WHERE team_name = 'TeamA';
SELECT player_name, injury_type, recovery_status FROM Player p JOIN Injury i ON p.player_id = i.player_id WHERE i.injury_type = 'Ankle Sprain';

SELECT p.player_name, t.treatment_name, t.treatment_date FROM Player p JOIN Injury i ON p.player_id = i.player_id JOIN Treatment t ON i.injury_id = t.injury_id WHERE p.age > 25 AND t.treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT p.player_name, r.progress_date, r.recovery_notes FROM Player p JOIN Injury i ON p.player_id = i.player_id JOIN RecoveryProgress r ON i.injury_id = r.injury_id WHERE r.progress_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth, position FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT MAX(player_id) AS max_player_id FROM players;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE position = 'Midfielder';
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM players ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT player_name, injury_type, injury_date FROM players JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id WHERE injuries.injury_type = 'Knee Injury';

SELECT players.player_name, treatments.treatment_date, recovery_progress.recovery_status FROM players JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id JOIN treatments ON injuries.injury_id = treatments.injury_id JOIN recovery_progress ON treatments.treatment_id = recovery_progress.treatment_id WHERE players.position = 'Defender';
